content: [alette krumr] More travel? No, we've already come so far...
[alette krumr] Who's Jorundr?
[alette] They'll listen to Iver?
[iver_shield] It's Krumr's call. It won't be long before dredge are here, too.
[iver_shield] What do you think?
[krumr alette] Hah, he hasn't told you? Of course he hasn't. Do what you need to, but don't be long.
[krumr] But I'll join you to Grofheim.
[krumr] But you made this a problem, didn't you?
[krumr] If I had it my way, I'd stay here and let the dredge come.
[krumr] I've talked with the warriors here. I'll be honest with you, half want to go north and find out what happened at Blotsbalkr.
[krumr] No, it won't. If there's one thing we should do it's tell Jorundr what's going on.
[krumr] None of them are happy you're here.
[krumr rook] It doesn't work like that. These varl are here to get away from civilization, not make one.
[krumr] Some think we should go to Grofheim instead.
[krumr] Stay here and rest, but once yours are ready to go, we do. I'm going to see off those who want to head north.
[krumr] Stop the pouting, girlie. Even if Jorundr won't listen to a tired old varl like me I have a feeling he'll pay attention to your friend Yngvar, here.
[krumr] This is a varl town, most of us take care of ourselves. You've got women, children...
[krumr] Varl king. Well, as close to one as we have. Yngvar, where'd you find these people?
[krumr] We can't feed this many people for long, even if they don't eat much.
[rook] We could pitch in... make this place livable.
{skip} mark1=rook mark2=krumr mark3=iver_shield mark4=alette
